name: Newfound Courage
description:
Newfound Courage is a story-driven adventure game about a gay hero who falls in love with his best friend while the world unravels around them.

Alex's story starts in the strange cliffside town of Silverpine that is home to The Vault, a mysterious institute containing the knowledge of a long-dead civilisation. Alex must explore The Vault's many mysteries and help the colourful townsfolk he meets along the way, while learning to understand and accept his feelings for another young man named Jake.

For fans of games like To the Moon or stories like Love, Simon or Call Me by Your Name.

Key Features

  • A short game (about three hours) focused on the narrative with some light simulation and puzzle mechanics.
  • A wholesome, emotional and personal gay coming of age romance where your story choices matter.
  • 100% custom-made pixel art settings, characters and animations.
  • Featuring a beautiful soundtrack by award-winning composer Jessica Kelly.
